name: Bridgedale Storm Midweight Knee Socks - Unisex
description: Don't let wet conditions keep you indoors. These knee-height merino blend socks have a waterproof-breathable membrane to keep your feet warm and dry when wading through rivers or streams, or when the weather turns particularly bad.Outer sock is 95% nylon and 5% elastane. Liner sock is 54% merino wool, 36% polyester, 7.5% nylon and 2.5% elastane.HydroTech waterproof-breathable polyurethane laminate keeps water out in even the wettest conditions.Wicking lining manages moisture and insulates to keep your feet cozy. Liner is 54% merino, 36% polyester, 7.5% nylon, 2.5% Lycra.Elasticated arch support prevents bunching.Flat toe seam adds comfort.
